registerLocation

public boolean registerLocation(Location loc)
                         throws AdaptorException
Parameters:
loc - All assembly table entries for this Location are retrieved ans stored in the contained mapper
Returns:
The boolean indicates wether the Location is from the beginning or from the end of the chain, so this doesnt have to be checked again
Throws:
AdaptorException
